page.title: 15The Farmer's Wife's Day
page.content: Up at 7.First job is to let the chickens out and feed them.Next get the cow in and milk her.She must stay in till the vet has been.Breakfast.9.00 ring the vet,fetch the two sick calves in;bring the ponies in as the farrier is coming later.The Spray Rep.arrives just when I started housework so I make him coffee while he waits.Later the vet arrives,examines the cow and confirms she is in calf and due at Christmas.Now the two calves;the heifer has pneumonia and the steer has a double abcess.I hold the steer while the vet lances them.Both animals must stay in for a week.Just time for a quick lunch before the farrier comes.It takes him 2 hours to reshoe the 2 mares and trim the foal.3.30,just finished in time to get the children from school.After a cup of tea the afternoon feeding.Supper 2 hours late:straying cattle.
